anya-e0803n7:238_2: ca “sārathino āhaṁsū”ti ca “dve cakkavattino”ti ca evamādīni.
anya-e0803n7:238_3: Tattha kiñcāpi katthaci “seṭṭhi sārathi”iccādi rassattapāṭho dissati,
anya-e0803n7:238_4: tathāpi so sabhāvena rassattabhāvo pāṭho na hoti,
anya-e0803n7:239_2: tathāpi isisaddena samānagatikattā isisaddassa aggisaddena samānapadamālattā agginayena padamālā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n7:239_3: Nanu ca bho ettha tassīlattho dissati “mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esanasīloti mahesī”ti,
anya-e0803n7:239_4: tasmā “bhūmisāyī”ti padassa viya daṇḍīnayeneva padamālā kātabbāti?
anya-e0803n7:239_6: Imassa hi “mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esi gavesi esitvā ṭhitoti mahesī”ti atassīlattho eva yujjati.
anya-e0803n7:239_8: Isisaddena cāyaṁ saddo īsakaṁ samāno kevalaṁ samāsapariyosāne dīghavasena uccāriyati,
anya-e0803n7:239_10: Yasmā rassattaṁ gahetvā tassa padamālākaraṇaṁ yujjati,
anya-e0803n7:239_12: Na hi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane katthacipi catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanarūpaṁ viya “mahesino”ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n7:239_13: Tasmā īkārantavasena uccāritassapi sato rassavasena uccāritassa viya “mahesi, mahesī, mahesayo. Mahesiṁ, mahesī, mahesayo.
anya-e0803n7:239_17: tabbasena pana “mahesī, mahesī, mahesiyo. Mahesiṁ, mahesī, mahesiyo.
anya-e0803n7:239_20: Hatthīsaddassa pana hattho assa atthīti evaṁ īkārantavasena gahaṇe “hatthino”ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:239_22: Tasseva tasmiṁyevatthe rassaṁ katvā gahaṇe “hatthayo”ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:240_0: “Haṁsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā;
anya-e0803n7:241_0: Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmi tulyatā.
anya-e0803n7:243_0: Sopi tattha mahā hoti, neva bālo sarīravā”ti
anya-e0803n7:244_1: Evamassa daṇḍīnayena ca agginayena ca dvidhā padamālā,
anya-e0803n7:244_3: Iminā nayena avuttesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena porāṇaṭṭhakathānurūpena ca padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n7:245_0: Ettāvatā bhūdhātumayānaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṁ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca nānappakārato dassitā.
anya-e0803n7:248_0: Sadā suṭṭhu cinteti vāceti yo so,
anya-e0803n7:250_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
